July 2,1963
Miss Margery Morris
R. 767, International House
500 Riverside Drive
New York 27, New York
Dear Miss Morris:
It is my pleasure to extend the N.A.E.B. contract with you to continue working
on the Radio English Teaching programs which are being prepared for the
United States Information Agency.
We have arranged a salary of $600 for the month of July. Is there any
particular payment schedule which would be particularly suitable for you ?
For our records and yours, we would appreciate your signing the enclosed
form which outlines the conditions of your employment.
It is my understanding that your expense check was sent from here earlier
this week. Please let me know if you haven't received it.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
